poha.description:
The interview was recorded on May 27, 2003 with Ṣādiq Bakīr ʻAnnān, male, born in 1910 in Gaza, Palestine. He was a trader.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع صادق بكير عنان في 27 أيار مايو عام 2003، ذكر، ولد عام 1910 في غزة، فلسطين. كان تاجرًا
poha.contents: Socio-economic conditions and family relations. (@ 0:00)||Economic conditions during the British rule. (@ 18:25)||Social conditions in Jaffa. (@ 38:24)||Political turmoil, revolutionaries and military activity . (@ 54:57)||City occupation and exile. (@ 69:47)

poha.description:
The interview was recorded on May 13, 2003 with Rajab al-Maṣrī, male, born in 1918 in Ghazzah, Palestine. He was a coffeehouse owner. 

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع رجب المصري في 13 أيار مايو 2003، ذكر، ولد في .العام 1918 في غزّة، فلسطين. كان يملك قهوة
poha.contents: Socio-economic conditions in Haifa . (@ 0:03)||Economic conditions in Haifa during the British mandate. (@ 18:43)||Zionist invasion . (@ 32:9)||Political activity and social life . (@ 40:50)||Political dynamics under British rule and Zionist colonization. (@ 55:35)||Political activity during the Zionist occupation. (@ 71:46)||Refugee life. (@ 98:35)
